text_block_list.text: The deadline for the submission of these documents 'miraculously' overlapped, but somehow I managed to finish them. During a break――

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: I'm coming in! ……Trainer-san, you alive~? I brought you something!

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: Ahhh~, you look exhausted again. You probably haven't even eat yet, huh? I guess coming here was the right call.

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: Go on, eat this. I washed it already and it's still cold! You could eat it right now.
Katsuragi Ace's thoughfulness almost brought a tear to my eye. I received the tomato from her and took a hearty bite.

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: Hahaa! Right~? After all, I'm a farmer's girl! These are Katsuragi Ace-sama's homegrown vegetables, you see!

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: I got it from the field I borrowed from the academy, so it's a freshly picked tomato! ……If you're interested, want to take a look on your break?
Before Katsuragi Ace's training, I went to look at her field. It seemed exceptionally well-maintained, so I asked――
choice_data_list: Why are you borrowing this field?
Why are you borrowing this field?

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: Ah, well, since I was young, I've been helping out with the fields at home! If I don't do a little field work in the mornings, it just doesn't feel right.

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: ……And so, I asked the Chairman and then set this up! My family had a laugh when they told me 『Even though you went to the city?!』.

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: Yep! Yesterday, they sent me a picture of when we were all working the fields saying 『A nostalgic picture!』

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: ――It was still dark in the morning, so we'd all head to the field in a line. And if anyone yawned, then everyone would end up doing it too.

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: 『So you've appeared, Yawning Bandit!』  we'd say, and it'd turn in to a game of tag! In the end, Mom would end up carrying Dad along……how nostalgic.

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: I wonder if everyone's doing alright~. At this point, I could probably carry my dad too, don't you think?
……Katsuragi Ace was probably feeling a little lonely. Even though she was talking about something pleasant, her tail was just swaying in the wind.
She was usually composed, but she was still a student. I needed to keep it together and follow up here――
choice_data_list: I want to try working the field too!
I want to try working the field too!

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: Eh? Work the field……? What're you saying all of a sudden?
……though half of it was just out of expedience. The real goal was to help console her.
While I couldn't become a replacement for her family, I could at least make sure she wasn't alone.

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: Hehee, is that so!? ……Alright! Then, can you help me with the harvesting?

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: And while we're at it, you can take some too! There's alot after all! ……I'll go get some scissors!
I nodded in response. Now I could just enjoy the harvest, so I squatted down in the tomato field――At that moment――

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: Trainer-san!? Are you okay!? Is there a snake!?

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: Huh?
I had fallen on my butt and was pointing. The caterpillar was on the stem of a tomato.

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: Ah, a Swallowtail caterpillar. I guess seeing one up close would be kind of shocking, huh~.

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: ……Alright, if you stay here, you'll probably keep surprising this person, so, sorry, but I'm gonna have to move you somewhere else~.

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: ……Alright, if you stay here, you'll probably keep surprising this person, so, sorry, but I'm gonna have to move you somewhere else~.

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: I've let it go, so it should be fine now! Seems like you fell on your butt, but you didn't hurt your hips did you?

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: I guess bugs are kinda scary if you're not used to them. ……right, I'll take care of the harvesting then!

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: I feel bad making you do something you're not used to. I'll get this done quick, so just wait a bit.

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: Tomatoes, cucumbers, and some corn too! I've already checked for insects so it should be ready to eat!

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: It's fine! Taking some of the veggies helps me out too. ……Alright, it's about time we get to training!
Saying that with a smile, Katsuragi Ace left the field. ……But I could still tell that she felt a little lonely without her family.
What should I do to cheer up Katsuragi Ace? I stared at the vegetables I'd received while thinking about it.
